misfit Documentation¶

This is the documentation for misfit.

Reference/API¶

misfit Package¶

This is an Astropy affiliated package.

Functions¶

test([package, test_path, args, plugins, ...]) Run the tests using py.test.

Classes¶

EmissionLinesSpectrum1DModel(\*\*kwargs) Define a spectrum made of multiple linesets set of emission lines and profiles for 1D spectra of a single lineset
FitEmissionLines2D([galaxy, instrument, ...]) Fit the kinematics of a 2D spectrum, using a set of lines.
Galaxy(\*\*kwargs) Galaxy class to contain information about spectra for MISFIT.
GalaxyBasic(\*\*kwargs) Basic galaxy class.
Imager(\*\*kwargs) Class to describe the spectrograph for MISFIT, including slit properties
Instrument(\*\*kwargs) Class to describe the instrument for MISFIT
IntensityProfile(galaxy[, intProfile_r, ...])
IntensityProfileFiducial(galaxy, \*\*kwargs)
IntensityProfileSersicExpScale(galaxy, \*\*kwargs)
KinModel2D(galaxy[, thetaSettings, ...]) Class to handle kinematic fitting models.
KinModel2DOptions([nSubpixels, pad_factor, ...]) Class to hold model options for KinModel2D
KinProfile([theta, name, theta_names, ...])
KinProfileFiducial(\*\*kwargs)
MCMC2DOptions(\*\*kwargs) Class to hold options for 2D MCMC fitting, including output filenames.
MCMCResults(\*\*kwargs) Class to hold results from 2D MCMC fitting:
ObsSpectrum(\*\*kwargs) Class to hold observed spectra.
ObsSpectrum1D(\*\*kwargs) Class to hold 1D spectra.
ObsSpectrum2D(\*\*kwargs) Class to hold 2D spectra.
ObsSpectrum2DBasic(\*\*kwargs) Class to hold basic 2D spectra.
PSFBase(\*\*kwargs) Basic PSF class
PSFGaussian(\*\*kwargs)
PSFMoffat([PSF_beta])
Pstamp(\*\*kwargs) Basic Pstamp class
Spectrograph(\*\*kwargs) Class to describe the spectrograph for MISFIT, including slit properties
Spectrum(\*\*kwargs) Basic Spectrum class
Theta2DSettings([theta, theta_vary, ...]) Class to initialize the settings needed for the fitting parameters, which is passed to the fitEmis2D object.
Theta2DSettingsFiducial(\*\*kwargs) Class to initialize the settings needed for the fitting parameters, which is passed to the fitEmis2D object.
ThetaPriorFlat([theta, theta_vary, theta_bounds])
